recipesJson.name: Mellow Elk (creme brulee tobacco for pods nic salts))
recipesJson.author: Slushy
recipesJson.description: Sweet caramel  Cream custard and bold tobacco....I use 12mg nic salts for my pod system... mixing notes just to say I'm not a pro mixer but I have been around vaping and mixing close to 3 years plus. My actual interest in vaping started out in 2010 when I was buying juice from a company called Johnson's creak this reminds me of one of there flavors...
